directions: Mix together eggs, corn syrup, brown sugar, coconut, oats, butter or margarine, and salt.  Pour into the unbaked pie shell.
Bake at 325 degrees F (165 degrees C) for 45 minutes, or until golden in color and knife inserted in center comes out clean.
ingredients: 1 recipe pastry for a 9 inch single crust pie
title: Oatmeal Pie IV
